etymology.description: Depicts the side view of a dog
etymology.interpretation: The character 犬(犬) (quǎn, 'dog') visually resembles a dog viewed from the side, with features that suggest the head and body of the animal. This pictorial representation allows for an intuitive understanding of its meaning.

examples.chinese: 他的犬非常温顺(他的犬非常溫順)。
我家的犬喜欢跑步(我家的犬喜歡跑步)，也爱安静(也愛安靜)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ jiā de quǎn xǐhuān pǎobù, yě ài ānjìng。
examples.english: The dog at my home likes to run and also loves tranquility.
